title: Total Manager 3.7.0 – Archive utility and media viewer
content: Total Manager is a powerful file manager with a classic double-window and multi-tab interface. It is not only a professional archiving app that can easily compress, extract and preview almost all archive files like ZIP, RAR, 7z and more, but also supports viewing images, playing audios / videos together with basic operation such as copy, […]

title: SimBooster Pro 1.4.0 – System optimizing utility
content: SimBooster Pro is an all-in-one package that includes a variety of system tools to help you clean and protect your Mac. For slow Macs, SimBooster can release RAM to increase the processing speed. It can also help users protect their personal data from malicious cookies. title: myTuner News Pro 1.0.3 – Listen to the latest newscasts
content: With myTuner News Pro listen to the breaking news of 200 of the most reliable news sources in 50 countries and stay up-to-date on what is going on in your country and in the world. Moreover, save your preferred newscasts in favorites and play them at startup. If you want to listen to other newscasts/podcasts, […]

title: LanScan Pro 3.0 – Discovers active devices on a network
content: LanScan Pro is a simple and efficient IPv4 network scanner that discovers all active devices on any subnet: the local one, or any public subnet that you configure.   Features: Auto-detection of configured interfaces: Airport, Ethernet, virtual interfaces,… Scan the IP range you like, from 1 IP to the whole IPv4 address space! title: FlowVella 1.1.1 – Device-independent presentations with cloud-based storage
content: FlowVella allows you to create beautiful interactive presentations that bring your ideas to life on Mac, iPad, and the Web. FlowVella is a re-imagining of presentation software. It is simple, elegant, fast, and has been designed specifically for OS X and iOS. Presentations can be viewed by anyone, on any device!   FlowVella uses cloud-based […]

title: FastComputer 1.3 – Accelerate and optimize your Mac
content: FastComputer a new Mac-only computer accelerator and optimizer application with a powerful computer acceleration algorithm, gorgeous design and remarkably simple user interface. FastComputer is here to protect your computer from apps that eat up your computer’s resources. They slow your Mac down and can even freeze it completely! title: Due 1.3 – Set reminders in your own words
content: Due lets you type “Make dinner reservation at 9am tomorrow” and your reminder is set for 9 AM tomorrow.    “Cancel subscription in 1 month” and you get a buzz a month later.   Just tell Due in your own words what you’d like to do, and when you’d like to be reminded.   There […]

title: ClockDesk 1.2.1 – Clock for your desktop wallpaper
content: ClockDesk is a beautiful clock right on your desktop wallpaper.   Version 1.2.1: choose 12h/24h clock display changed App icon   Intel, 64-bit processor OS X 10.8 or later

title: Billings Pro Server 1.7.2 – Multi-use time tracking and invoicing solution
content: Billings Pro is a powerful multi-user time tracking and invoicing solution for the Mac and iPhone, with a Web interface called Timecard for non-management staff.   Billings Pro was built for service-based small businesses with 1 to 50 users, and offers a unique solution for the utmost flexibility. title: Xpressive 1.2.8 – CSS3 live authoring tool
content: XPressive is a CSS3 live authoring tool. You can rapidly and easily create Web content. XPressive has many intuitive editing features for HTML5 and CSS3.
